Package controllers

Class MovieController

java.lang.Object
controllers.MovieController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MovieController extends Object implements Serializable
Controller class that handles the creation, deletion, and editing of Movies, as well as displaying the parameters.
See Also:

    Controller method that allows the user to select a movie from a list of movies Calls a menu (movieActionList) for a user to view and leave reviews, make bookings

    • printMovieListByStatus

      public void printMovieListByStatus()
      It prints a list of movies based on the user's input and then calls movieSelector on the chosen movie for further action (booking, review, etc)

    • movieSelector

      public void movieSelector(ArrayList<Movie> movieSelectionList)

    • movieActionList

      public void movieActionList(Movie selectedMovie, MovieGoer movieGoer)

      Parameters:
      selectedMovie - Movie object
      movieGoer - MovieGoer object

    • viewTop5
